#summary &beta; character entity

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &beta;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Beta;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0392/index.htm U+00392].
  * `&beta;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03b2/index.htm U+003B2].
